meta.name: ccleaner
meta.description: CCleaner Professional is the most powerful version of Piriform's celebrated PC cleaner. It makes it easy to speed up a slow computer and keep your activity private — automatically and in the background.

meta.name: audacity
meta.description: Audacity is a free, easy-to-use, multi-track audio editor and recorder for Windows, Mac OS X, GNU/Linux and other operating systems. The interface is translated into many languages.

meta.name: rufus
meta.description: Rufus is a utility that helps format and create bootable USB flash drives, such as USB keys/pendrives, memory sticks, etc.

meta.name: telegram
meta.description: Telegram is a non-profit[15][16] cloud-based instant messaging service. Telegram client apps are available for Android, iOS, Windows Phone, Windows NT, macOS and Linux.[14] Users can send messages and exchange photos, videos, stickers, audio and files of any type.

meta.name: viber
meta.description: Make calls, send messages and much more - freely and securely. Join millions of people around the globe and enjoy the world’s most comprehensive communication experience.
